Framesfoundry Finn is a stainless steel round frame glasses with printed acetate side arms. This is a fun design which has chalk white colour trimmed with a gold border. The side arms have spring hinges for added strength and comfort.
Suitable for distance, reading, bifocal, varifocal, computer use and sunglasses.
